diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $12$ units.
The measure of angle $BAC$ is $x$ degrees.
The length of the line $AB$ is $y$ units.
The line $BC$ is perpendicular to the line $BD$.
The length of the line $AD$ is equal to the length of the line $BD$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, forming a triangle $ABD$.
There are lines $BC$, $BD$, forming a right angle at point $B$.
